1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Textual list mapping.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Sieve.Sivmap
6  ( Sivmap (..),
7    sivmapId, sivmapEq,
8    sivmapKeep, sivmapOmit,
9    sivmapAssoc,
10    sivmapChain,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator        as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Sieve.Tree      as S
16
17-- | Mapping for textual lists.
18data Sivmap t
19    = SivmapId                    -- ^ Identity
20    | SivmapEq    t               -- ^ Equality
21    | SivmapKeep  t S.SivExpr     -- ^ Keep by sieve pattern
22    | SivmapOmit  t S.SivExpr     -- ^ Omit by sieve pattern
23    | SivmapAssoc t t             -- ^ Associatoin of key and value
24    | SivmapChain (Sivmap t) (Sivmap t)  -- ^ Sivmap chain
25      deriving (Show, Eq)
26
27instance Functor Sivmap where
28    fmap _ (SivmapId)           = SivmapId
29    fmap f (SivmapEq t)         = SivmapEq (f t)
30    fmap f (SivmapKeep t e)     = SivmapKeep (f t) e
31    fmap f (SivmapOmit t e)     = SivmapOmit (f t) e
32    fmap f (SivmapAssoc tk tv)  = SivmapAssoc (f tk) (f tv)
33    fmap f (SivmapChain m1 m2)  = SivmapChain (fmap f m1) (fmap f m2)
34
35instance Monoid (Sivmap t) where
36    mempty  = SivmapId
37    mappend = sivmapChain
38
39-- | Identity mapping.
40sivmapId :: Sivmap t
41sivmapId = SivmapId
42
43-- | Equal mapping.
44sivmapEq :: t -> Sivmap t
45sivmapEq = SivmapEq
46
47-- | Filter by sieve pattern.
48sivmapKeep :: (S.ToSivExpr t) => t -> Sivmap t
49sivmapKeep t = SivmapKeep t (S.toSivExprOr S.fail t)
50
51-- | Anti-filter by sieve pattern.
52sivmapOmit :: (S.ToSivExpr t) => t -> Sivmap t
53sivmapOmit t = SivmapOmit t (S.toSivExprOr S.fail t)
54
55-- | Mapping chain.
56sivmapChain :: O.Bin (Sivmap t)
57sivmapChain SivmapId f = f
58sivmapChain f SivmapId = f
59sivmapChain f g = SivmapChain f g
60
61-- | Association mapping.
62sivmapAssoc :: t -> t -> Sivmap t
63sivmapAssoc = SivmapAssoc
